definition: "hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to have children/to raise or bring up/to educate
to withdraw/to leave/to retreat/to pull out
to eliminate/to sack/to remove from office
variant of 撤銷|撤销[che4 xiao1]
to dismiss and replace (sb)/to replace (sb or sth)
to cut/to throw out/to depose (from office)/to tear off

sentences.english: I had to flee to the airport.
sentences.chinese: 我得赶紧撤到机场去了。

sentences.english: The officer commanded his men to retreat into the castle.
sentences.chinese: 军官命令手下撤到城堡里去。

sentences.english: However, in February 2007, the report was withdrawn amid accusations of plagiarism.
sentences.chinese: 但是，2007年2月，该报告却因剽窃指控而被撤。

sentences.english: Finally climbing frame was decided to remove.
sentences.chinese: 最终攀登架被决定撤去。

sentences.english: On the way to the island, he would pull in the oars and just let the boat drift where it wished, for hours at a time.
sentences.chinese: 在去荒岛的途中，他会撤了浆任由小舟随波逐流。

sentences.english: Eventually the 20th Division was out-flanked and forced to fall back southwards .
sentences.chinese: 最后第20师的侧翼崩溃了，他们向南方撤去。

sentences.english: Then I guess you'll need to escape on the Ark Angel like everyone else.
sentences.chinese: 那么我猜你会需要和其他人一样撤到“方舟天使”号。

sentences.english: Thrown into a panic, MA Fawu ordered his two corps to withdraw south.
sentences.chinese: 这样，马法五就惊慌了，命令他的两个军南撤。

sentences.english: She cleared the dishes from the table.
sentences.chinese: 她把桌子上的盘子撤去。

sentences.english: Pasang is immovable, and they start the descent.
sentences.chinese: 但是帕桑不为之所动，于是他们开始下撤。

sentences.english: Move inland to higher ground as quickly as possible.
sentences.chinese: 这时要尽快撤到内陆的高地。

sentences.english: SanYing retreated from the battlefield were assigned to assist WeiShengDui tents.
sentences.chinese: 三营从战场上撤了下来被布置协助卫生队搭帐篷。

sentences.english: As he didn't realize the tasks, the Qing government dismissed him from his post.
sentences.chinese: 由于他未能完成任务，清政府撤去其职。

sentences.english: The latitudinal fluctuation started at east of the subtropical high belt over the mid-Pacific, propagated westward gradually.
sentences.chinese: 副高南撤现象从副高带的东部开始，逐渐西传。

sentences.english: He quietly removed thin, crisp, taut energy to climb over a high altitude.
sentences.chinese: 他悄悄地撤去细线，以雄劲的气力攀登在高空之上。

sentences.english: They cleared the dishes from the table.
sentences.chinese: 他们将桌上的盘碟撤去。

definition: to withdraw/to leave/to retreat/to pull out
to defend one's property to the death/to cling obstinately to old habits/die-hard
to retreat/to decline/to move back/to withdraw
to retreat and defend/to withdraw and maintain one's guard
to return (an item)/to send back/to go back
to get away from/to withdraw/to free oneself
